name: Piercer
senses: blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond that radius), passive Perception 8

actions.name: Pierce
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  one target directly underneath the piercer. Hit: 10 (3d6) piercing damage. This attack has disadvantage against a creature that is protecting its head with a shield or similar object. If the attack misses  the piercer dies.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the piercer is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.
